original_text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains, and the chains had been plucked asunder by him, and the fetters broken in pieces: neither could any man tame him.
korean_text: 이는 여러 번 고랑과 쇠사슬에 매였어도 쇠사슬을 끊고 고랑을 깨뜨렸음이러라 그리하여 아무도 그를 제어할 힘이 없는지라

sentences.original_text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 여러 번 족쇄와 사슬에 묶였기 때문에

sentences.original_text: and the chains had been plucked asunder by him
and the fetters broken in pieces
neither could any man tame him
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람도 그를 길들일 수 없었습니다
